VContainer.justification: Fastest Unity DI container, 5-10x faster than Zenject, zero GC allocation, essential for scalable architecture

MessagePipe.justification: High-performance messaging for MVP communication, integrates perfectly with VContainer and UniTask

UniTask.justification: Zero-allocation async/await for Unity, replaces coroutines with better performance and error handling

Newtonsoft.Json.justification: Robust JSON serialization for level data and game progress persistence

Addressables.justification: Async asset loading and memory management, crucial for mobile performance and future server level loading

Unity UI Toolkit.justification: Modern UI system with better mobile performance than uGUI, supports data binding

Unity Test Framework.justification: Essential for testing MVP architecture and services, already included

Memory Profiler.justification: Critical for mobile memory optimization and leak detection

Unity Netcode.justification: For future multiplayer features or server synchronization

Unity Analytics.justification: Player behavior tracking for level difficulty balancing
